thread.title: RCN Gives Music Fans Instant Access to Music On-the-Go
thread.title_full: RCN Gives Music Fans Instant Access to Music On-the-Go

author: AnnMarie DePaulis
title: RCN Gives Music Fans Instant Access to Music On-the-Go
text:
RCN, an industry-leading provider of high-speed Internet, digital TV and phone services, announced today that RCN customers can now access Music Choice’s robust line-up of Music Channels and thousands of music videos as well as other content from Music Choice on PCs, mobile and other devices – including original programs, while on-the-go. RCN Digital TV customers will have access to 50 commercial-free music channels and thousands of music videos via MusicChoice.com, and through Music Choice’s apps available on iPhone, iPad and Android devices. They will also have access to Music Choice Play, a 24-hour linear music video and pop culture network for millennials.
“RCN continues to focus on providing customers high-quality, convenient viewing experiences, whenever and wherever they choose,” said Chris Fenger, Chief Operating Officer for RCN. “We have dramatically increased the amount of content customers can access anywhere, included with their RCN service. We’re committed to making our customers’ experience as enjoyable and easy as possible. With our Music Choice partnership, music lovers now have another great option.”
Music Choice’s vast library is available free to all RCN Digital TV customers with a subscription to the Signature video tier and above. Users can access anytime, anywhere by downloading the Music Choice app from iTunes or Google Play or by logging on to http://www.MusicChoice.com on PCs. From there, customers enter their RCN credentials and start enjoying immediately.
Additional information about RCN’s full portfolio of services can be found at rcn.com or by calling 1-800-RING-RCN. For more information about Music Choice http://www.MusicChoice.com .
# # #
About RCN Telecom Services, LLC
RCN Telecom Services, LLC ( http://www.rcn.com and http://www.rcn.com/business ) provides industry-leading high-speed Internet, all-digital TV and phone services for residential, small/medium and Enterprise business customers. PC Magazine’s Readers’ Choice Award named RCN one of the winners for best ISPs in 2013 and 2015 – RCN was rated highest in overall satisfaction. RCN is YouTube HD Verified, earning the company the highest-ranking Google offers. RCN is also a Netflix Open Connect partner, placing in the top 10 rankings in the markets RCN serves on the Netflix USA ISP Speed Index. RCN's affordably priced advanced digital services are delivered through our proprietary, state-of-the-art fiber-rich network and supported by 100% U.S.-based customer service. RCN's primary service areas include Boston, Chicago, Lehigh Valley (PA), New York City, Philadelphia and Washington, D.C.
About Music Choice
Music Choice, the multi-platform video and music network, delivers its music programming to millions of consumers nationwide through their televisions, online and mobile devices. Music Choice programs dozens of uninterrupted music channels; produces originals that feature today’s hottest established and emerging artists; offers thousands of music videos through its Video On Demand platform; and launched Music Choice Play, the music video, lifestyle and entertainment network for Millennials. For additional information log on to http://www.MusicChoice.com | Twitter: @MusicChoice | Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/MusicChoice
